Metadata.title: VideoFly - AI Video Generation Platform
Metadata.description: Create stunning AI-generated videos in minutes with Sora 2, Veo 3.1, and more

Hero.title: Transform Your Ideas Into Stunning Videos
Hero.subtitle: with AI
Hero.description: Create professional AI-generated videos in minutes. From text to video, image to video, or enhance existing footage.
Hero.creditsHint: Free credits to start • No credit card required

Notifications.generationWillNotify: Generation may take a while. We'll notify you when it's ready.

Showcase.title: Created With VideoFly
Showcase.subtitle: Amazing videos, generated by AI
Showcase.description: Explore stunning videos created by our community using AI-powered generation. From cinematic landscapes to product animations.
Showcase.ctaText: Ready to create your own masterpiece?

Features.title: Everything You Need
Features.subtitle: Powerful features to create amazing videos
Features.description: Discover the tools and features that make video creation easy and fun

bottomCTA.text: Ready to transform your ideas into videos?

textToVideo.title: Text to Video
textToVideo.description: Transform your text prompts into stunning videos using advanced AI models

imageToVideo.title: Image to Video
imageToVideo.description: Animate your images and bring them to life with AI video generation

enhancement.title: Video Enhancement
enhancement.description: Upscale, enhance, and extend your existing videos with AI

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Generate professional videos in just 2-5 minutes

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data is encrypted and videos are stored securely

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Track your video generation progress in real-time

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Export in various aspect ratios for any platform

ai.title: Advanced AI
ai.description: Powered by the latest AI video generation models

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Create your video in 4 simple steps
HowItWorks.description: Get started in minutes with our intuitive video creation workflow

download.title: Download & Share

welcome.subject: Welcome to VideoFly!
welcome.title: Welcome to VideoFly!
welcome.body: Thank you for joining VideoFly! We're thrilled to have you on board.

featuresList.generate: Generate stunning AI videos in minutes
featuresList.models: Use multiple AI models like Sora 2, Veo 3.1, and more
featuresList.share: Download and share your creations anywhere

welcome.footer: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

resetPassword.subject: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.body: We received a request to reset your password for your VideoFly account.
resetPassword.instruction: Click the button below to reset your password:
resetPassword.validity: This link will expire in 30 minutes and can only be used once.
resetPassword.security: For security reasons, this link expires after 30 minutes.
resetPassword.ignore: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
resetPassword.footer: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

magicLink.subject: Sign In to VideoFly
magicLink.title: Sign In to VideoFly
magicLink.body: We received a request to sign in to your VideoFly account.
magicLink.instruction: Click the button below to sign in:
magicLink.validity: This link will expire in 24 hours.
magicLink.security: For your security, this link can only be used once.
magicLink.footer: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.
